title: Implement PII detection + redaction controls for ingested conversations and issue evidence

sections.text: Add workspace-level controls to detect and redact common PII (e.g., emails, phone numbers, addresses, tokens) from ingested support conversations, extracted evidence snippets, and issue notes. Ensure redaction is applied before persistence and before any downstream sync (e.g., Jira/Linear) while preserving referential integrity back to the source conversation where allowed. Expose redaction settings and redaction preview in the admin UI/API, including allow/deny lists and an option to store only hashed identifiers for matching/deduplication.
